item.title: MOST simple dicing tut every(PI)
item.dc:creator: @fasthop10 fasthop10
item.description:
@fasthop10 wrote:

if (itemId ==  15098){
	if (c.clanId >= 0) {
		c.startAnimation(11900);
		c.gfx0(2075);
		Server.clanChat.messageToClan("<shad=6081134><col=862396>" +c.playerName+ " rolled a  "+(Misc.random(99)+1)+" on the precentile dice", c.clanId);
	}else{
		c.sendMessage("you are not in a clan");
	}
}

item.title: MOST simple dicing tut every(PI)
item.dc:creator: @soldierslim2 soldierslim2
item.description:
@soldierslim2 wrote:

““ALL YOU DO IS CLICK THE (DICE BAG UP TO 100) AND IT WILL MAKE THE ACTION AND LOOK LIKE REAL DICING””
this is a snippit but idk were to put it this is a easy wasy to just add dicing to your server
ok so first goto src>server>model>players>packets>click item
now find some thing like thisif (itemId == 2528) { c.getItems().deleteItem(2528,1); c.getPA().showInterface(2808); }
under it add this code ""if thats not ur dice bad dice to 100 item code then goto item.cfg and search dice bag and find the 1 that say dice bad up to 100 it should be tho

[f (itemId == 15098) { c.startAnimation(11900); c.gfx0(2075); final int Min = 1, Max = 100; final int random = (int) (Min + (Math.random() * Max)); c.forcedChat("I have rolled a " + random); }/code] well very simple acculy

o yeh i did not stal this i just put some codes together and made this if this is allready posted then im sorry :l
